Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurring before SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of process variants that include SW-Initial Reviewer Selection followed by any reviewer invitation or assignment activity (e.g., SW-AE Assign Reviewers, Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of times SW-Initial Reviewer Selection is directly followed by SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities that eventually lead to SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection compared to the frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurs but no subsequent SW-Reviewer Agreed is observed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Number of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection events per manuscript submission (case)
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurrences that are part of variants ending in SW-EIC Accept versus those ending in rejection or revision outcomes
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection relative to Plagiarism Originality Report Completed, indicating its position in the review workflow
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection activities that are followed within 7 days by at least one SW-AE Assign Reviewers event
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of distinct cases containing SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that also contain SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response' occurs

Name: Percentage of all SW-Initial Reviewer Selection instances that occur after SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in variants that include multiple reviewer assignment attempts (e.g., repeated SW-AE Assign Reviewers or Reviewer Invitation Reminders)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection events that precede any form of reviewer outcome (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer Unavailable, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
